com.neebal.android.simplyreliable

Interface SimplyReliableInfraIntf


  • public interface SimplyReliableInfraIntf
    An interface that represents the various methods that will be called at various points in the lifecycle of the SimplyReliable api. Classes wishing to get a handle of these lifecycle notifications must implement this interface
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Neebal Technologies

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initFromAttach(SimplyReliableInfra simplyReliableInfra)
      a chance for the observer to initialize itself on attachment to the SimplyReliableInfra subject.
      void onEndOfRecovery()
      this callback will be invoked when the recovery phase of the simplyreliable infra ends gracefully
      void onForceEndOfRecovery()
      The api was forced to end its recovery process.
      void onInfraShuttingDown(String shutDownMessage)
      this callback will be invoked when the simplyreliable infra is shutting down
      void onLocalAreaConnectionDown()
      this callback will be invoked when the local area connection on the client system goes down
      void onLocalAreaConnectionUp()
      this callback will be invoked when the local area connection on the client system is up now
      void onMessageBeingSent(OutMessage outMessage)
      this callback will be invoked when a particular OutMessage is scheduled for being sent to the server, but not yet sent to the server
      void onMessageSentFailure(OutMessage outMessage)
      this callback will be invoked when a particular OutMessage was sent to the server, but failed due to some reason.
      void onMessageSentSuccess(OutMessage outMessage)
      this callback will be invoked when a particular OutMessage was successfully sent to the server.
      void onServerDown()
      this callback will be invoked when the remote server goes down after an up phase
      void onServerUp()
      this callback will be invoked when the remote server goes up after a down phase

    • Method Detail

      • initFromAttach

        void initFromAttach(SimplyReliableInfra simplyReliableInfra)
        a chance for the observer to initialize itself on attachment to the SimplyReliableInfra subject. The observer is guaranteed that during this initFromAttach call invocation, nothing will update in the underlying subject
        Parameters:
        simplyReliableInfra - the subject that the observer wants to attach to

      • onForceEndOfRecovery

        void onForceEndOfRecovery()
        The api was forced to end its recovery process. This happens when the recovery takes more than the usually allocated time.

      • onServerUp

        void onServerUp()
        this callback will be invoked when the remote server goes up after a down phase

      • onServerDown

        void onServerDown()
        this callback will be invoked when the remote server goes down after an up phase

      • onLocalAreaConnectionUp

        void onLocalAreaConnectionUp()
        this callback will be invoked when the local area connection on the client system is up now

      • onLocalAreaConnectionDown

        void onLocalAreaConnectionDown()
        this callback will be invoked when the local area connection on the client system goes down

      • onInfraShuttingDown

        void onInfraShuttingDown(String shutDownMessage)
        this callback will be invoked when the simplyreliable infra is shutting down
        Parameters:
        shutDownMessage - the shutdown message indicating the cause of the shut down

      • onEndOfRecovery

        void onEndOfRecovery()
        this callback will be invoked when the recovery phase of the simplyreliable infra ends gracefully

      • onMessageBeingSent

        void onMessageBeingSent(OutMessage outMessage)
        this callback will be invoked when a particular OutMessage is scheduled for being sent to the server, but not yet sent to the server
        Parameters:
        outMessage - the outmessage instance

      • onMessageSentSuccess

        void onMessageSentSuccess(OutMessage outMessage)
        this callback will be invoked when a particular OutMessage was successfully sent to the server.
        Parameters:
        outMessage - the outmessage instance

      • onMessageSentFailure

        void onMessageSentFailure(OutMessage outMessage)
        this callback will be invoked when a particular OutMessage was sent to the server, but failed due to some reason.
        Parameters:
        outMessage - the outmessage instance
